# thecloud_secret (Resource)

Secret resource allows you to manage sensitive information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thecloud_secret" "db_pass" {
  name        = "DB_PASSWORD"
  value       = "secret-value-123"
  description = "Production database password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the secret.
- `value` (String, Sensitive) The sensitive value of the secret.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the secret.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the secret.
